name: Durbin v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc., Appellant; Durbin, Appellants, v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Durbin v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc.

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Durbin v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc., Appellant. Durbin, Appellants, v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel L. Rodgers, for S. P. Lightholder, Inc., appellant at No. 5 and appellee at No. 6.
Francis H. Patrono, with him Robert D. Beck, and Patrono, Oeisler, Edwards <& Pettit, for H. D. Durbin et ux., appellants at No. 6 and appellees at No. 5.

Durbin v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc., Appellant. Durbin, Appellants, v. S. P. Lightholder, Inc.

Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
